us.pserver.revok

Class MethodChain

  • java.lang.Object
    • us.pserver.revok.MethodChain

  • public class MethodChain
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a list of methods wich will be invoked in sequence (i.e.: someobj.toString().length() ).
    Version:
    1.1 - 201506
    Author:
    Juno Roesler - juno@pserver.com

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      MethodChain()
      Default Constructor without arguments.

      Add a RemoteMethod constructed with passed arguments.

      Return the current RemoteMethod of the internal iterator.
